title: 5 Ghost Stories of Walter de la Mare
description:
5 Ghost Stories of Walter De La Mare

1 of 5 - All Hallows
A weary traveller is oppressed by the supernatural atmosphere inside a gigantic cathedral by the sea. Read by Richard E Grant.
